price: Es ziemt dem Allerbarmer nicht, Sich Kinder zu nehmen.
arabic: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wamā yanbaghī lilrraḥmāni an yattakhidha waladan
